title: How to improve my score on the JEE Mock tests provided that I am studying 6-7 hours daily and still getting 35-40% on mock tests - Quora

response.answer_text: it doesnot matter for how much time u are studying .What rally matters is the no of effective hours for which u are studying . Focus on concept understanding and strengthening. Solving 100 easy questions wontget u anywhere in jee rather if u solve 10 difficult questions.those are the ones which gonna help u .after solving each difficult question ,u should analyze it and understand the concept behind it .also try to find out what can be the other possible ways to solve the same as it will help u in time management . During mock test ,dont think that u have to attempt all paper .First just focus on easy question in the test ,then on the topics u are most strong in and finally i u have any time left try to solve remaining questions
